item.title: CVE-2023-2807|2023-09-26T10:25:07.973Z -- artica%20pfms -- pandora%20fms
item.description: Authentication Bypass by Spoofing vulnerability in the password reset process of Pandora FMS allows an unauthenticated attacker to initiate a password reset process for any user account without proper authentication. This issue affects PandoraFMS v771 and prior versions on all platforms.
